article:
Events and trends *The element Mercury has been discovered in Egyptian tombs
dating from this decade. *1506 BC â Cecrops, legendary King of Athens, dies
after a reign of 50 years. Having survived his own son, he is succeeded by
Cranaus. *c. 1506 BC â Thutmose I (Eighteenth dynasty of Egypt) starts to rule.
Alternatively, a date of c. 1504 BC is a possibility. *Egypt conquers Nubia and
the Levant (1504 BCâ1492 BC). *Earliest remains of domesticated ferrets
found. *Biblical Exodus, according to Simcha Jacobovici in the
earliest suggestion of the documentary Exodus Decoded. *c. 1500 BC â Polynesians
settle in Fiji, (controversial Fiji settlement) *c. 1500 BC â Mycenaean
civilization starts in Ancient Greece. *c. 1500 BC â Eleusinian Mysteries start
in Ancient Greece. *c. 1500 BC â Formative/Preclassic period starts in
Mesoamerica. *1500 BCâ500 BCâVedas are composed.
